name: Eyeball of The Beholder
description:
WASD to Move

Left Click to Shoot

This is the first game I made in Unity, my first game I want to familiarize myself with the Unity UI and basic coding. even though it has a rather short entertainment value (though I doubt it even has) I learn so many things.

I learn a lot during the making. Aseprite animation, 2D sprite, Collider, Rigidbody, Unity new input system, animator and animation, basic C# logic. sound effects, camera shakes, health systems, and so much more. 

Enjoy, I would love to hear your feedback, critique, or anything.

Credit for Little Robot Sound Factory for the sound effects! you can check them out here :  www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com
